title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1beta1\TextStream
name: TextStream
description:
Encoding of a text stream. For example, closed captions or subtitles.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1beta1.TextStream

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.codec
params.description: The codec for this text stream. The default is "webvtt". Supported text codecs: - 'srt' - 'ttml' - 'cea608' - 'cea708' - 'webvtt'

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Required. The BCP-47 language code, such as "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unicode_locale_identifier.

params.name: data.mapping
params.description: The mapping for the Job.edit_list atoms with text EditAtom.inputs.
